name: Name
absPermit.permitReference: Reference number of the permit or its equivalent
absPermit.relatedIRCCs: Links to other internationally recognized certificate(s) of compliance (IRCC) that relate(s) to this permit
absPermit.dateOfIssuance: Date of issuance of the permit or its equivalent
absPermit.dateOfExpiry: Date of expiry of the permit or its equivalent
absPermit.picGranted: Confirmation that prior informed consent (PIC) was obtained or granted
absPermit.entitiesToWhomPICGrantedLink: Person or entity to whom prior informed consent (PIC) was granted
absPermit.usagesDescription: Additional information about the specified uses covered by the permit or its equivalent or use restrictions
absPermit.permitDescription: Documentation- Short description of the attached links and/or files
absCheckpointCommunique.title: Record title
absCheckpointCommunique.absCheckpoints: Checkpoint/s that collected or received the information
absCheckpointCommunique.dateCollected: Date  information was collected at the Checkpoint
absCheckpointCommunique.subjectMatter: Subject-matter or genetic resources relevant to the information collected or received
absCheckpointCommunique.entityWhoGranted: Person or entity who granted prior informed consent (PIC)
absCheckpointCommunique.evidenceOfPIC: Reference or evidence of prior informed consent (PIC) or Reference number of the permit or its equivalent
absCheckpointCommunique.evidenceOfMAT: Reference or evidence of establishment of mutually agreed terms (MAT)
absCheckpointCommunique.description: Short description of the information collected or received by the checkpoint relevant to the utilization of genetic resources
absCheckpointCommunique.dateOfAccess: Date of access to the genetic resources
